name: Luciole
description:
In a world where night is eternal, where dark creatures lurk in the surrounding shadows, and where humans are primitive; They know the fire, but its creation still eludes their young minds.

Away from the tribe, Luciole finds the gift of fire in the heart of the forest, and now bears the burden to bring back a flame to his god, for he alone can shine away the everlasting night....

for survive you should stay in the light, grab tree branch and ignite it for light your way

I made this game alone, i don"t have the time for music and..death condition sorry ^^"

azerty/qwerty: **qwerty commande isn't inthe jam's build, sorry, it's in azerty.**

a/q=left
d/d=right
s/s=pick up object ( crate, torche) on the floor or pose objetc
e/e=close to a light source, ignite a new torch for 1 wood if you hold nothing , or get wood on the trees
q/a=when you hold a torch, consume 1 of wood, re ignite the torch
w/z=climb a crate
